statements: UPDATE client_preferences SET preference_1 = 'sports', preference_2 = 'music' WHERE client_id = 12345;
UPDATE client_preferences SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Jones', preference_3 = 'shopping' WHERE client_id = 54321;
UPDATE client_preferences SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE client_id=1;
UPDATE client_preferences SET preference_1='Red', preference_2='Blue', preference_3='Green' WHERE client_id=2;
UPDATE clients SET email = 'john.doe@email.com' WHERE client_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_strategies SET strategy_description = 'Long-term investment strategy' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE clients SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE client_id=1000;
UPDATE trading_strategies SET strategy_description='Updated strategy details', created_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE strategy_id=500;
UPDATE clients SET client_balance = 500 WHERE client_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE trading_strategies SET strategy_description = 'Short-term strategy' WHERE strategy_type = 'Stocks';
UPDATE clients SET client_balance = client_balance + 1000 WHERE client_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE trading_strategies SET strategy_description = 'New and improved strategy' WHERE client_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE clients SET email = 'test@example.com', phone = '1234567890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_data = '{
key1
value1
key2
value2
}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE clients SET address='123 Main St, New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_data='{
key1
value1
key2
value2
}' WHERE client_id=2 AND strategy_name='Strategy A';
UPDATE clients SET phone_number = '+1234567890', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE client_id = 1;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 15000.00, client_id = 2 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE clients SET phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE client_id=1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount=500.00, timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id=100;
